name: rComments - Reddit Hover Comments
description: Quick and hassle-free traversal of Reddit comments

scripts.build: yarn run test && mkdir -p dist && cp -R static/* dist && yarn run build-js && yarn run build-css
scripts.zip-chrome: yarn run build && zip -r extension.zip dist
scripts.zip-firefox: yarn run build && cd dist && zip -r -FS ../firefox-extension.zip *

author: Ignacio Ampuero
